H3.text: when did the book thief movie come out. 2013

A4.text: The Book Thief premiered at the Mill Valley Film Festival on October 3, 2013, and was released for general distribution in the United States on November 8, 2013.

A5.text: It expanded to a wide release on November 27, 2013.
